hanzi-su-wiki:
棚

Значения

Полка

Мнемоника

Деревянная 木 постройка для друзей 朋, шалаш, куда мог войти каждый без спроса. Позднее — полка, доступная каждому (она не закрыта).
purpleculture_pinyin:
péng
shed; canopy; shack
пролить; навес; лачуга
rtega_mnemonic:
棚棚RStent, awning, booth, shed, shelf
  • made in wood 木 to not sleep under the moon 月 or to have a horizontal acquaintance 朋 with something
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 朋 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

凉棚 [ liáng péng ]: mat awning; arbor
棚户区 [ péng hù qū ]: shantytown
天棚 [ tiān péng ]: ceiling; awning
茅棚 [ máo péng ]: thatched shed

heisig_chinese_memo: A shed is a wooden companion to help with storage.
heisig_constituent: shelf, tree, wood, companion, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, moon2, month2, flesh, 2, part of the body2
heisig_story: One often thinks of books as "good companions," but here it is the shelf we store them on that is the companion. The reasons should be obvious: it is made of the same stuff, wood, and spends a lot more time with them than we do! Here again, be careful not to let the rationality of the explanation get in the way before you turn it into a proper story.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: shelf, ledge, rack, mount, mantle, trellis
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: полка, карниз, стойки, крепления, мантия, шпалеры
koohiiStory1: A shelf is a wooden companion to books.
koohiiStory2: I think of an Otaku, with a wooden shelf full of anime action figure statures, who are sadly his only companions.
jp_example_words:
戸棚(とだな): cupboard, locker, closet, wardrobe
棚(たな): shelf
本棚(ほんだな): bookshelves
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tree with two moons on either side, holding the tree up in a horizontal angle, is a shelf.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: So, your shelf is made up of a tree and two moons. Imagine this shelf and put things on it. The moons are kind of rolling around, making it hard to build your shelf.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Your moon shelf is great. It's also huge, because moons are really big. That means you can store a ton-a-stuff (たな) on it.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Think about the ton-a-stuff you're going to put on there. Like, literally, measure out a ton of things and put them on there. It can hold it!
Ru_Meaning: shelf, ledge, rack, mount, mantle, trellis
Ru_trainchinese: péng: (сущ) навес; сарай, лачуга; потолок
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the tree's (木) friend (朋) is a shelf
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A shed is a wooden companion to help with storage.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " and " peng ", the original meaning is attic. "Shuowen": "Stacks. From the woods, friends sound." "Sui Shu‧ Biography of Liu Yu": "High sheds across the road, wide curtains of clouds, beautiful costumes, and cars and horses choking."

" Shed " can mean a canopy frame or a simple hut built with bamboo, wood and other materials. Qian Shu Guanxiu, "Shang Feng Shijun Shanshui Shoji": "Sit in the firewood shed, and boil the red spring.

" Shack " can also mean cronies and gangs. Tang Fengxian "Feng Family Hearing and Seeing Records-Gong Ju": "During Yuan Zong, scholars were Yin Sheng, and those who came to the province every year would not lose more than a thousand people. The students in the museum were more accomplished, and they made friends with each other and fished together. Win, the number is a shed."

The establishment of the army in the Qing Dynasty was also called " Peng ". Qing Chen Kangqi's "Lang Qian Jiwen" Volume 12: "There are fifty horses in each post, five sheds for scattered courage, one shed for every ten people, one long per shed, and nine for scattered courage."

" Peng " can also be used as a quantifier to indicate scenes and times. Ming Shen Defu "Ye Huo Bian·Xian Xiang·Aoshan Caused Fire": "When I went up to the Leopard Room, looking back at the flames and candles, I jokingly said: "What a big fireworks in a shed."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " peng ", the original meaning is attic.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「朋」聲，本義為閣樓。《說文》：「棧也。从木，朋聲。」《隋書‧柳彧傳》：「高棚跨路，廣幕陵雲，袨服靚粧，車馬填噎。」

　　「棚」可表示用竹、木等材料搭起的篷架或簡陋小屋。前蜀貫休〈上馮使君山水障子〉：「柴棚坐逸士，露茗煮紅泉。」

　　「棚」也可表示朋黨、幫派。唐封演《封氏聞見記‧貢舉》：「元宗時，士子殷盛，每歲進士到省者常不減千餘人。在館諸生更相造詣，互相朋黨，以相漁奪，號之為棚。」

　　清代軍隊的編制單位也稱為「棚」。清陳康祺《郎潛紀聞》卷十二：「每哨馬勇五十名，散勇五棚，每十人為一棚，每棚什長一名，散勇九名。」

　　「棚」還可用作量詞，表示場、次。明沈德符《野獲編‧禨祥‧鰲山致火災》：「時上往豹房，回顧火燄燭天，戲謂左右曰：『好一棚大煙火也。』」

從「 木 」，「 朋 」聲，本義為閣樓。《說文》：「棧也。从木，朋聲。」《隋書‧柳彧傳》：「高棚跨路，廣幕陵雲，袨服靚粧，車馬填噎。」 「 棚 」可表示用竹、木等材料搭起的篷架或簡陋小屋。前蜀貫休〈上馮使君山水障子〉：「柴棚坐逸士，露茗煮紅泉。」 「 棚 」也可表示朋黨、幫派。唐封演《封氏聞見記‧貢舉》：「元宗時，士子殷盛，每歲進士到省者常不減千餘人。在館諸生更相造詣，互相朋黨，以相漁奪，號之為棚。」 清代軍隊的編制單位也稱為「 棚 」。清陳康祺《郎潛紀聞》卷十二：「每哨馬勇五十名，散勇五棚，每十人為一棚，每棚什長一名，散勇九名。」 「 棚 」還可用作量詞，表示場、次。明沈德符《野獲編‧禨祥‧鰲山致火災》：「時上往豹房，回顧火燄燭天，戲謂左右曰：『好一棚大煙火也。』」
From the sound of " wood" and " peng", the original meaning is attic. "Shuowen": "Stacks. From the woods, friends sound." "Sui Shu‧ Biography of Liu Yu": "High sheds across the road, wide curtains of clouds, beautiful costumes, and cars and horses choking." " Shed" can mean a canopy frame or a simple hut built with bamboo, wood and other materials. Qian Shu Guanxiu, "Shang Feng Shijun Shanshui Shoji": "Sit in the firewood shed, and boil the red spring. " Shack" can also mean cronies and gangs. Tang Fengxian "Feng Family Hearing and Seeing Records-Gong Ju": "During Yuan Zong, scholars were Yin Sheng, and those who came to the province every year would not lose more than a thousand people. The students in the museum were more accomplished, and they made friends with each other and fished together. Win, the number is a shed." The establishment of the army in the Qing Dynasty was also called " Peng". Qing Chen Kangqi's "Lang Qian Jiwen" Volume 12: "There are fifty horses in each post, five sheds for scattered courage, one shed for every ten people, one long per shed, and nine for scattered courage." " Peng" can also be used as a quantifier to indicate scenes and times. Ming Shen Defu "Ye Huo Bian·Xian Xiang·Aoshan Caused Fire": "When I went up to the Leopard Room, looking back at the flames and candles, I jokingly said: "What a big fireworks in a shed."

棚字的基本解释

棚
péng
用竹木搭成架子，上面覆盖席、布等做成的遮蔽风雨日光的东西或简陋的小屋：天棚。帐棚。窝棚。棚车。

棚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄萌切，平耕，並。］
［《廣韻》薄庚切，平庚，並。］
［《廣韻》步崩切，平登，並。］
(1)栈，阁。
(2)用竹、木等材料搭起的篷架或简陋小屋。
(3)谓搭棚。
(4)朋党，帮派。
(5)见“棚朳”。
(6)清代军队的编制单位。
(7)通“堋”。挂箭靶的矮墙。
(8)量词。犹场；次。

棚字的英文翻译

◎ 棚
canopy, cote, shed

棚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页533第02
【唐韻】薄庚切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲庚切，?音彭。【說文】棧也。【博雅】閣也。【唐書·游環傳】朱泚大治戰棚雲橋，環火其棚。　又【東京歲時記】七夕，家家錦采結爲乞巧棚。　又【博雅】棚矢藏也。　又【廣韻】蒲萌切，音輣。【集韻】蒲登切，音朋。義?同。

棚字的源字形

棚字的起名意思

：用竹、木搭成的篷架或小屋。

shed
Basic explanation of words
shed
péng
Use bamboo and wood to build a shelf, and cover it with mats, cloth, etc. to shelter things from wind, rain and sunlight or simple huts: ceilings. Tent. shack. boxcar.
shed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" thin cut, flat plowing, combined. ]
["Guangyun" Bo Gengqie, Ping Geng, and. ]
["Guangyun" collapsed step by step, flattened, and merged. ]
(1) Stack and pavilion.
(2) Canopies or simple huts built with bamboo, wood and other materials.
(3) It is called scaffolding.
(4) Clan, gang.
(5) See "Peng Xiao".
(6) The establishment unit of the army in the Qing Dynasty.
(7) Through "堋". A low wall with an archery target.
(8) Quantifiers. Still field; times.

Source glyph
shed
Name meaning
: A canopy frame or small house made of bamboo and wood.
形声字。木表意,篆书形体像树木,表示棚用竹木搭建;朋(peng)表声,朋友是彼此相近相合的,表示棚是由许多竹或
木交合而成的。本义是用竹木搭成的篷架或小屋。
用竹木等搭成的遮蔽太阳、风雨的设备或简陋的房屋:

棚
péng
棚
棚
隶
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Деревянный знак означает, что сценарий печати похож на дерево, что означает, что сарай построен из бамбука и дерева; Пэн означает, что друзья похожи друг на друга, что означает, что сарай сделан из многих бамбука или дерева.
Первоначальное значение - каркас навеса или домик из бамбука и дерева.
Оборудование или простые домики из бамбука и дерева для защиты от солнца, ветра и дождя: cool ~ 1 cow ~ | 工 ~.
~ Дом ~ Круг ~ Цзыцао ~ Дин ~ гуа ~ Тянь ~ Гнездо ~
пролить
пролить
пролить
писец
Кай
péng
сущ./счётное слово
1) навес; шалаш; павильон; временная постройка
凉棚 тент
马棚 конюшня
售货棚 ларёк
2) группа; товарищество
3) уст., воен. отделение (в 14 чел., дин. Цин)
步兵三棚 три отделения пехоты
4) пекинский диал. приём, сеанс (счётное слово)
念了一棚经 прочитать канон (одно чтение перед гробом)
办一棚事 делать одно дело
Radicals: 木, 月  (tree, moon)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tree with two moons on either side, holding the tree up in a horizontal angle, is a shelf.
So, your shelf is made up of a tree and two moons. Imagine this shelf and put things on it. The moons are kind of rolling around, making it hard to build your shelf.
Reading Mnemonic
Your moon shelf is great. It's also huge, because moons are really big. That means you can store a ton-a-stuff (たな) on it.
Think about the ton-a-stuff you're going to put on there. Like, literally, measure out a ton of things and put them on there. It can hold it!
